citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:13 AM on
9/24/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the registrant by placing a phone call/voicemail, ringing the door bell, and
sending a text message. The inspector was unable to reach the registrant.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:13 AM on 
9/24/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the registrant by placing a phone call/voicemail, ringing the door bell, and 
sending a text message. The inspector was unable to reach the registrant.  
 
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
